com.incoming.pvnsdk

Interface VideoPlaybackEventService


  • public interface VideoPlaybackEventService
    Used to record events generated by a video player.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  VideoPlaybackEventService.VIDEO_PLAYBACK_COMPLETION_ACTION
      Describes the various watch actions that are recorded on sensation data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPause(VideoDescriptor video, int currentPositionMillis)
      The video has been paused.
      void onPlay(VideoDescriptor video, int currentPositionMillis, double cueTimeSeconds)
      Video playback has started.
      void onStart(VideoDescriptor video)
      A new video is being loaded into the video player and playback is about to start.
      void onStop(VideoDescriptor video, VideoPlaybackEventService.VIDEO_PLAYBACK_COMPLETION_ACTION completionAction, int currentPositionMillis)
      Video playback has ended.

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart(VideoDescriptor video)
        A new video is being loaded into the video player and playback is about to start.
        Parameters:
        video - the video provided to the video player by the launch intent.

      • onPlay

        void onPlay(VideoDescriptor video,
          int currentPositionMillis,
          double cueTimeSeconds)
        Video playback has started. This may be from the beginning of the video, when the video is resumed after being paused , or when the user completes a seek action in the video. A seek action should be treated as onPause(VideoDescriptor, int) at the position the seek action began, followed by onPlay(VideoDescriptor, int, double) at the position video viewing resumed.
        Parameters:
        video - the video that is being played
        currentPositionMillis - the position in the video when playing began in milliseconds.
        cueTimeSeconds - The interval between when the user requests playback and when playback starts. Pass 0 if this information is unavailable.

      • onPause

        void onPause(VideoDescriptor video,
           int currentPositionMillis)
        The video has been paused. A seek action should be treated as onPause(VideoDescriptor, int) at the position the seek action began, followed by onPlay(VideoDescriptor, int, double) at the position video viewing resumed.
        Parameters:
        video - the video that was paused
        currentPositionMillis - the position of the video when it was paused in milliseconds

      • onStop

        void onStop(VideoDescriptor video,
          VideoPlaybackEventService.VIDEO_PLAYBACK_COMPLETION_ACTION completionAction,
          int currentPositionMillis)
        Video playback has ended.
        Parameters:
        video - the video that was played
        completionAction - the reason why playback completed
        currentPositionMillis - the position of the video when playback ended in milliseconds
